Text: How do you expect anyone to know whether or not they want to download this with a description as short and vague as this? Next time try a little specificity for crying out loud.

The video is not about Christianity.nor flying saucers nor smoking dope. It's about understanding what freedom means in the Declaration of Independence. It is a political statement  
  My video about my practice of my religion which shows me smoking reefer and partying my freedom and then my conversation about it is this:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6000903/Sit_Down_And_Get_High_With_God_-_Cannabis_Is_Holy_
